Package com.github.tamir7.contacts

Class Query

java.lang.Object
com.github.tamir7.contacts.Query
public final class Query extends Object
The Query class defines a query that is used to fetch Contact objects.

      public Query whereContains(Contact.Field field, Object value)
      Add a constraint to the query for finding string values that contain the provided string.
      Parameters:
      field - The field that the string to match is stored in.
      value - The substring that the value must contain.
      Returns:
      this, so you can chain this call.

      value - The substring that the value must start with.

      this, so you can chain this call.

    • whereEqualTo

      public Query whereEqualTo(Contact.Field field, Object value)
      Add a constraint to the query for finding values that equal the provided value.
      Parameters:
      field - The field that the value to match is stored in.
      value - The value that the field value must be equal to.
      Returns:
      this, so you can chain this call.

    • hasPhoneNumber

      public Query hasPhoneNumber()
      Restrict the return contacts to only include contacts with a phone number.
      Returns:
      this, so you can chain this call.

    • or

      public Query or(List<Query> queries)
      Constructs a query that is the or of the given queries. Previous calls to include are disregarded for the inner queries. Calling those functions on the returned query will have the desired effect. Calling where* functions on the return query is not permitted.
      Parameters:
      queries - The list of Queries to 'or' together.
      Returns:
      A query that is the 'or' of the passed in queries.

    • include

      public Query include(Contact.Field... fields)
      Restrict the fields of returned Contacts to only include the provided fields.
      Parameters:
      fields - The array of keys to include in the result.
      Returns:
      this, so you can chain this call.

    • find

      public List<Contact> find()
      Retrieves a list of contacts that satisfy this query.
      Returns:
      A list of all contacts obeying the conditions set in this query.
